response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been designed to enhance your daily life. It's a unique item that combines functionality and style, making it a perfect fit for someone like you who appreciates quality and innovation. Given its exceptional features and craftsmanship, we believe its value exceeds $120. To make this opportunity even more appealing, I am offering it to you for $145. This price reflects not only its intrinsic value but also the exclusive access you would have to such a high-quality product. Don't miss out on this chance to elevate your experience. Let me know if you're interested in securing this offer.", "product_price": 145}
